## NumericToken type

The union of all possible CSS tokens that represent a numeric value

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type NumericToken = TokenDimension | TokenNumber | TokenPercentage;
```
**References:** [TokenDimension](./css-tokenizer.tokendimension.md)<!-- -->, [TokenNumber](./css-tokenizer.tokennumber.md)<!-- -->, [TokenPercentage](./css-tokenizer.tokenpercentage.md)
